projects.title: Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: PokeDiscovery - Pokemon Database Website
projects.bodyText:
- Built a web application that displays Pok√©mon stats, abilities, and item info using PokeAPI.
 - Features include abilities, items, stat comparison, and descriptions of every region.

projects.title: Umutukas Spying Weather App
projects.bodyText:
- Weather tracking app displaying location-based weather data such as temperature, humidity, and pressure.
 - Shows current location's name, country code, current weather conditions, and 3-hourly & daily forecasts.

projects.title: The Triple CBW (Final Year Project)
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a game combining Chess, Solitaire, and a Typewriter tool to study the impact of casual gaming on anxiety and stress.
 - Implemented Chess AI using data from grandmaster games to find optimal moves.

projects.title: The Abandoned Crowhawk
projects.bodyText:
- A first-person exploration game developed in Unreal Engine using C++ and Unity-based wireframing.
 - Demonstrated understanding of Game Engine Architecture and level design.
 - Goal is to find 6 notes, leading to a key, and then escaping from the village.

projects.title: HTML Design Templates - Email
projects.bodyText:
- Some Email design templates created during my work experience for various companies.
 Completed using HTML and CSS
